ENABLE_MPI:BOOL=OFF
ENABLE_OPENMP:BOOL=OFF

BUILD_GTEST:BOOL=OFF
BUILD_TESTS:BOOL=OFF
BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=OFF
ENABLE_EXAMPLES:BOOL=OFF
ENABLE_VALGRIND:BOOL=OFF
